org.gwtbootstrap3.client.ui.form.validator

Class GroupValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gwtbootstrap3.client.ui.form.validator.GroupValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.gwt.event.shared.HasHandlers, ValidationChangedEvent.HasValidationChangedHandlers

    public class GroupValidator
extends Object
implements ValidationChangedEvent.HasValidationChangedHandlers
    Useful for validating a group of fields that implement the HasValidators interface.
    Author:
    Steven Jardine

      • validate

        public boolean validate()
        Validate the group. This calls #validate(Editor, Object) on each field in the group.
        Returns:
        true, if successful

      • validate

        public boolean validate(boolean show)
        Validate the group. This calls #validate(Editor, Object) on each field in the group.
        Parameters:
        show - do we want to show the user the result of the validate via ui marks?
        Returns:
        true, if successful
